value.name: Expert says he believes officer who shot, killed man in northwest OKC acted in self-defense
value.description: Police said Daniel Hobbs reached for the officer's taser. An expert told KOCO 5 that he believes the officer, who is part of the Oklahoma City Police Department's Crisis Intervention Team, acted in self-defense.

video.name: Expert says he believes officer who shot, killed man in northwest OKC acted in self-defense

value.name: Man speaks out after nephew shot, killed by Oklahoma City police officer
value.description: An uncle spoke out and issued a message to the police department after his nephew was shot and killed by an officer last weekend in northwest Oklahoma City. Earlier this week, the police department released the body camera video of Daniel Hobbs' scuffle with the officer.

value.name: Witness Video, Bodycam Footage Released In Fatal Police Shooting Of OKC Man
value.description: Body camera footage, and a video from an onlooker shows what happened the day an Oklahoma City police officer shot and killed Daniel Hobbs. Oklahoma City police released a trove of new information ...

value.name: Inhofe wants to give police $7.5 million for mental health training
value.description: The Republican senator told a small group of reporters that he plans to file the Law Enforcement Training for Mental Health Crisis Response Act of 2021.

value.name: Inhofe proposes $7.5M for police mental health training
value.description: Less than a week after a man who said he was mentally ill was killed by Oklahoma City police, U.S. Sen. Jim Inhofe announced legislation that would boost mental health training for law enforcement.

value.name: OKC Police Investigating Officer-Involved Shooting That Killed Metro Father Of 2
value.description: The officer was placed on paid administrative leave following the shooting that killed 34-year-old Daniel Hobbs. Friends and family of Hobbs said on Monday that he struggled with mental health issues.

value.name: At Tulsa Police Memorial, Inhofe Announces Legislation To Fund Officers' Mental Health Training
value.description: Oklahoma's senior U.S. Senator, Jim Inhofe, visited the Tulsa Fallen Officers' Memorial at the Tulsa Police Academy Friday to recognize National Police

value.name: Oklahoma City Mother Mourns Her Son After Fatal Police Shooting
value.description: An Oklahoma City mother, Jeannie McClaine, spoke with News 9 on Monday following a fatal weekend police shooting that killed her 34-year-old son, Daniel Hobbs. “I don't understand why he was ...

value.name: OKC police shooting footage should be released to public sooner, consultant says
value.description: Oklahoma City police take too long to release video from officer-involved shootings, the city's law enforcement reform consultant says. In a letter this week, 21CP Solutions recommended the department develop a policy for releasing body-worn camera footage "at the earliest practical time.

video.name: OKC police shooting footage should be released to public sooner, consultant says

value.name: Authorities identify man shot and killed by OKC police officer
